name: Stronger than plastic
description: Arrow keys to turn and move. Pull trash with your net by moving it around. Pull trash into the recycling machine so it will be deleted. The trash recycler can only handle 30 trash before it has to recharge for 3 seconds. If trash gets into the recycler while it is still recharging then you lose a life. You also lose a life if the trash gets to the end of the screen. You have 5 lives.
